tasks.task_description: Verify EC2 instance status and state
Check security group rules for port 8080 access
Verify application/service status on the instance
Check instance system logs for errors

description: Investigate connectivity issue for application on EC2 spot instance at 52.10.113.30:8080 in us-west-2
context: Found deployment directory with CloudFormation templates and deployment scripts. Most recent deployment script is deploy-uswest2a-only.sh and template is uswest2a-only-template.yaml
Instance i-07baa206b9b5d69c9 is RUNNING (state code 16). Launched at 16:15:23 UTC today. Security group: sg-0f7c40126f06f9e78. Instance is m6a.2xlarge spot instance in us-west-2a.
Security group sg-0f7c40126f06f9e78 has port 8080 OPEN to 0.0.0.0/0 (all traffic). Security group is correctly configured. Also has ports 22, 80, 443 open.

APPLICATION IS WORKING! Code-server is running on port 8080 (PID 10254), bound to 0.0.0.0:8080. External curl test successful - received HTTP 200 OK with HTML content. The application is accessible and responding correctly.
